relnotes.name: FAT Filename Conversion Plugins
relnotes.purpose: Plugins for F32 for converting FAT file names from ther native encoding to Unicode and vice-versa. They plug into the File Server.

defect.title: FATCharsetconv for CP932 convert some characters incorrectly

relnotes.defect: Fixed FATCharsetconv perl file, to create correct cpp files.

deliverystep.name: Filename policy changes
deliverystep.preq: Updating the component source files to comply with the Symbian filename policy.

relnotes.minorchange: Symbian OS v9.3 component branched from common codeline
